name: Europa Uomo
goal:
Representing the voice of prostate Patients in Europe.
by awareness and education. working with all stake holders to benefit patients.

Supporting member organisations in their endevours in their home countries.

Providing training to members of affiliates which is aimed at building capacity of the affiliates at their local level
interests: Communication, Consumers, External Relations, Public Health
euInitiatives:
EAU Guidelines
European Prostate Awareness Day (In association with European Association of Urology)
Active Participation on EMA committees, working parties, SAGs and SAWPs.
Active Participation on in EAU Prostate Guidelines Committee
